title: Aadrika Diamond Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. Features high-quality Ruby cabochons
and lustrous freshwater pearls. Finished with a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a modern floral design with intricate filigree detailing. The central ruby cabochon and surrounding emerald accents add a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. The accompanying jhumkas feature a matching floral motif and delicate pearl drops, completing the set. The necklace features a flexible mesh-style band for comfort and style.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white diamonds. The rich red of the rubies and vibrant green of the emeralds create a stunning contrast. The white pearls add a soft
occasions: and festive occasions. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for contemporary parties and special events. A versatile piece for both traditional 'Muhurtham' and modern celebrations.
description: This Aadrika Haaram set offers a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style. The high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle, rivaling that of natural diamonds, at a fraction of the cost. The intricate design and Hyderabadi polish showcase exceptional craftsmanship, making this a truly remarkable piece. It's a statement of sophistication and elegance.
